error.message: Call to deprecated method link() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\EntityInterface::toLink()->toString() instead.
Call to deprecated method link() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\EntityInterface::toLink()->toString() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to cshs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
